channel.title: Morning and Evening with Charles Spurgeon
channel.description: Morning and Evening is a twice-daily podcast featuring the devotional work of Charles Spurgeon. Throughout the course of a year, Spurgeon emphasizes the importance of abiding in Christ and consistently meditating on God’s word.

image.title: Morning and Evening with Charles Spurgeon

channel.itunes:author: Crossway
channel.itunes:summary: Morning and Evening is a twice-daily podcast featuring the devotional work of Charles Spurgeon. Throughout the course of a year, Spurgeon emphasizes the importance of abiding in Christ and consistently meditating on God’s word.
channel.content:encoded: Morning and Evening is  a twice-daily podcast featuring the devotional work of Charles Spurgeon. Throughout the course of a year, Spurgeon emphasizes the importance of abiding in Christ and consistently meditating on God’s word.

item.title: March 1 | Morning
item.description: ❖ This is the devotional for the morning of March 1.❖ The Scripture for this devotion is Song of Solomon 4:16.❖ This podcast comes from Crossway's new edition of ⁠'Morning and Evening'⁠ written by Charles H. Spurgeon and revised by Alistair Begg. This podcast is narrated by Frazer Blaxland.

item.title: Introducing Morning and Evening with Charles Spurgeon on January 1st, 2026
item.description:
Morning and Evening is a twice-daily podcast featuring the devotional work of Charles Spurgeon. Throughout the course of a year, Spurgeon emphasizes the importance of abiding in Christ and consistently meditating on God’s word.
Subscribe to follow along, and pick up a print copy of the book from Crossway.

Morning and Evening is  a twice-daily podcast featuring the devotional work of Charles Spurgeon. Throughout the course of a year, Spurgeon emphasizes the importance of abiding in Christ and consistently meditating on God’s word.


Subscribe to follow along, and pick up a print copy of the book from Crossway.
